about_the_game:
It was produced as a graduation project for game major at Sangmyung University.
I'm not good enough, but please enjoy it.

A drug leak during an unknown experiment turned scientists into monsters.
You are tasked with finding a cure to escape the monster and returning them to their original form.

Get a cure by running away from the 3 kinds of monsters that attack you.
Monsters will roam around you and kill you relentlessly if they find you.

You are very weak. Never pick a fight with monsters.
You can use special weapons and items for him.

Go around every map, find the secret in "The ampoule" and find clues to move forward.
Of course, you can get various items in the middle of course.

Solve the puzzles in the way and move on.
Only you can save the world in "The ampoule."

content_descriptors.notes:
Elderly people, pregnant women, and people with blood phobia should be careful about playing

There are descriptions of stimulants and drugs, so please be careful about the play
